title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of educational principles and basic comprehension of teaching-learning theories
context.additional_context: Operating a mentoring system for current elementary school teachers, utilizing AI-based instructional design tools

learning_goals: One can explain the impact of school support systems on instructional design by analyzing survey data
Execute generative AI-powered instructional design content creation processes with over 80% accuracy
Enhance instructional design problem-solving abilities by 30% through self-efficacy improvement strategies
In a blended learning environment, collaborative tools can be used to revise and enhance instructional design plans based on peer feedback.

resources: Generative AI Tool Access (ChatGPT Educational Version)
AI Instructional Design Guidelines for Educators (PDF)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
